column3: Test Case Description
column4: Expected Result

column2: To Verify UI of OTP Screen.
column3:
Pre- Requisite: Enter Mobile number and navigate to OTP Page.
OTP bottomsheet should be displayed.
"OTP Verification" title needs to be displayed.
Verify design according to figma.
column4: Design should be according to figma.

column3:
Pre- Requisite: Enter Mobile number and navigate to OTP Page.
1. Verify "Continue" button should be disabled.
column4: Continue button should be disabled.

column3:
2. Enter any 2 digits.
Verify "Continue" button is disabled.
column4: "Continue" button should be disabled.

column2:
To Verify "Continue" button is enabled by entering correct
OTP.
column3:
Pre- Requisite: Enter Mobile number and navigate to OTP Page.
1. Enter the correct OTP in OTP blocks.
Verify Continue button and click on it.
column4:
"Continue" button is enabled.
Once user clicks on it, "Create an Account Page willl be displayed".

column2: To verify OTP Page by entering incorrect OTP.
column3:
Pre- Requisite: Enter Mobile number and navigate to OTP Page.
1. Enter incorrect OTP and click on "continue" button.
column4:
Invalid OTP number error message should be displayed below
OTP boxes.

column2:
To Verify proper mobile number is fetched from mobile 
number field to OTP Page field.
column3:
Pre- Requisite: Enter Mobile number and navigate to OTP Page.
Verify on OTP page at the top, correct number is fetched.
column4: On OTP Page, on top line correct mobile number should be displayed.

column3: Close OTP Verification screen.
column4: Focus should be shifted to Mobile number screen.

column3: Enter  another number in mobile number field and click on "Continue" button.
column4: OTP Verification bottomsheet is displayed.

column3: Verify the mobile number in OTP bottomsheet.
column4: It should fetch new number.

column2: To Verify timer in "Resend code" is displayed correctly.
column3:
Pre- Requisite: Enter Mobile number and navigate to OTP Page.
Verify timer on OTP Page.
column4: 30 secs timer needs to be displayed.

column3: Observe timer counting should drop.
column4: Timer counting should reduce.

column3: Verify after entering OTP, timer is not started again.
column4: After entering incorrect OTP timer should not reset.

column3:
Pre- Requisite: Enter Mobile number and navigate to OTP Page.
Let the timer be expired.
Verify Resend OTP link.
column4: Resend OTP Link will be displayed.

column3: Click on Resend OTP and verify the functionality.
column4: A new OTP should be generated.

column3: Enter incorrect OTP.
column4: "Incorrect OTP" message should be displayed.

column3: Now enter Correct OTP.
column4:
OTP should be validated.
Focus should be either on "Create An Account" page if unregistered 
user.
It should be on Home page if user is registered.

column2: To verify Try Different Method once OTP is not received.
column3:
Pre- Requisite: Enter Mobile number and navigate to OTP Page.
1. Do not enter OTP and let the timer expire.
column4:
Resend OTP 
Try a different method options will be displayed.

column3: Click on "Try a different method" link.
column4:
Bottomsheet will open with two options.
1. Verify using OTP on SMS.
2. Verify using OTP on WhatsApp.

column2: To verify "Verify using OTP on SMS" option.
column3:
Pre- Requisite: Enter Mobile number and navigate to OTP Page and let the timer expire.
1. Click on "Try a different method".
2. Choose "Verify using OTP on SMS"
column4:
Focus will be on "OTP verification" page.
A new OTP will be generated.

column2: To verify "Verify using OTP on WhatsApp" option.
column3:
Pre- Requisite: Enter Mobile number and navigate to OTP Page and let the timer expire.
1. Click on "Try a different method".
2. Choose "Verify using OTP on WhatsApp"
column4:
Focus will be on "OTP verification" page.
A new OTP will be generated.

column2:
To verify UI is displayed properly when switched from
Landscape mode to potrait and vice versa.
column3:
Pre- Requisite: Enter Mobile number and navigate to OTP Page.
Change orientation from potrait to landscape mode.
column4:
Orientation should be Landscape mode.
UI should not be distorted.

column3: Change orientation to Potrait mode again.
column4:
Orientation should be changed to Potrait mode.
UI should not be distorted.

column2:
To Verify user should be able to remove OTP by pressing
Back button.
column3:
Pre- Requisite: Enter Mobile number and navigate to OTP Page.
1. Enter thr OTP in OTP blocks.
column4: Digits should be entered in the blocks.

column3: 2. Press back button to remove the last digit.
column4: Last digit should be removed.

column3: 3. Enter a new digit in the last block.
column4: Focus will be on last digit.

column3: 4. Now move focus to third block and remove the digit by pressing back  button.
column4:
Digit should be removed and foocus should be on third block.
User should be able to erase and add digits easily.

column2:
To Verify proper message is displayed when there is no 
Internet connectivity.
column3:
Pre- Requisite: Enter Mobile number and navigate to OTP Page.
1. Disable WiFi Connection/Mobile Network.
column4: Proper message needs to be displayed.

column3: 2. Once connection is restored. Verify the focus.
column4: Focus will be on "Mobile Registration" page.

column2:
To Verify Timer on OTP Page should not displayed -ve 
Value.
column3:
Pre- Requisite: Enter Mobile number and navigate to OTP Page.
1. Let the timer on OTP expire.
2. Verify in timer no -ve value is displayed.
column4: On timer, once 30 secs is expired. No -ve timer value should be displayed.

column2: To verify last block OTP does not allow multiple digits.
column3:
Pre- Requisite: Enter Mobile number and navigate to OTP Page.
1. Enter multiple digits on last OTP block.
column4: Multiple digits should not be allowed on last OTP block.

column2:
To verify alphabets/ special character should not be 
allowed on OTP blocks.
column3:
Pre- Requisite: Enter Mobile number and navigate to OTP Page.
1. In OTP blocks, enter alphabets or special characters.
column4: Alphabets or special characters should not be allowed.

column2: To Verify Paste functionality should work for OTP Page
column3:
Pre- Requisite: Enter Mobile number and navigate to OTP Page.
1. In OTP block try pasting the OTP from SMS/ WhatsApp
column4: User should be allowed to paste OTP on OTP blocks.

column2: Verify expired OTP should not be accepted.
column3:
Pre- Requisite: Enter Mobile number and navigate to OTP Page.
1. Let OTP be expired.
2. Now try to enter expired OTP.
column4: Expired OTP should not be accepted and proper error message needs to be displayed.
